column4: How can I remove all the unwanted packages from my XUBUNTU install? like getting rid of all the games..
so should I click the start button then choose control panel and unistall?  ;)
I should just use aptitude then?  or is there a ubuntu specific tool?
thats what I'll be doing then..  ;)
either aptitude, or 'apt-get remove [--purge]  $pkgname' or 'aptitude remove $pkgname' or 'aptitude purge $pkgname' on the cmdline
